# Deluthium

> The Agent-Native Exchange. Unified RFQ liquidity infrastructure for autonomous AI agents, trading bots, and institutional market makers.

Deluthium is a decentralized exchange built on the Request-for-Quote (RFQ) model, designed from day one for programmatic and autonomous agent access. Instead of managing order books, agents simply request a quote, get a guaranteed price, and execute -- making it the ideal trading venue for AI agents.

## Core Documentation

- [README](README.md): Project overview, quick start, package listing
- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): Comprehensive agent integration guide with full API reference, type definitions, code workflows, error handling, and decision trees
- [SDK README](packages/sdk/README.md): Core SDK documentation (REST client, WebSocket client, signing, chain config)
- [CCXT Adapter](packages/ccxt-adapter/README.md): Standard CCXT exchange interface (simplest integration path)
- [Institutional Adapter](packages/institutional-adapter/README.md): FIX 4.4 gateway and OTC API for institutional market makers

## Quick Start

Install:
```
npm install @deluthium/sdk
```

Get a price quote (5 lines):
```typescript
import { DeluthiumRestClient, ChainId, toWei, fromWei } from '@deluthium/sdk';
const client = new DeluthiumRestClient({ auth: 'your-jwt-token', chainId: ChainId.BSC });
const quote = await client.getIndicativeQuote({
  src_chain_id: 56, dst_chain_id: 56,
  token_in: '0xbb4CdB9CBd36B01bD1cBaEBF2De08d9173bc095c',
  token_out: '0x55d398326f99059fF775485246999027B3197955',
  amount_in: toWei('1.0', 18),
});
console.log(`1 BNB = ${fromWei(quote.amount_out, 18)} USDT`);
```

Or use CCXT (3 lines):
```typescript
import { DeluthiumExchange } from '@deluthium/ccxt-adapter';
const exchange = new DeluthiumExchange({ apiKey: 'your-jwt-token', chainId: 56 });
const ticker = await exchange.fetchTicker('WBNB/USDT');
```

## API Overview

Base URL: https://rfq-api.deluthium.ai
WebSocket: wss://ws.deluthium.ai
Authentication: JWT Bearer token (Authorization: Bearer <token>)

REST Endpoints:
- GET  /api/v1/listing-pairs?chain_id=56     -- List trading pairs
- GET  /api/v1/listing-tokens?chain_id=56    -- List supported tokens
- POST /api/v1/indicative-quote              -- Non-binding price quote
- POST /v1/quote/firm                        -- Binding quote with on-chain calldata
- GET  /v1/market/pair                       -- OHLCV market data
- GET  /v1/market/klines                     -- Candlestick data

WebSocket Channels:
- depth:{pair}    -- Real-time bid/ask depth updates
- rfq_request     -- Incoming RFQ requests (for market makers)
- rfq_response    -- RFQ response (market makers send)
- heartbeat       -- Keep-alive (send every 30s)

## Packages

- @deluthium/sdk                   -- Core SDK (REST, WebSocket, signing, chain config)
- @deluthium/ccxt-adapter          -- CCXT exchange interface (simplest path)
- deluthium-hummingbot (pip)       -- Hummingbot connector
- @deluthium/0x-adapter            -- 0x Protocol v4 RFQ adapter
- @deluthium/1inch-adapter         -- 1inch Limit Order adapter + Oracle
- @deluthium/uniswapx-adapter      -- UniswapX Dutch auction filler
- @deluthium/hashflow-adapter      -- Hashflow WebSocket RFQ bridge
- @deluthium/paraswap-adapter      -- Paraswap aggregator liquidity source
- @deluthium/dydx-adapter          -- dYdX v4 order book bridge
- @deluthium/binance-dex-adapter   -- PancakeSwap / BNB Chain split-router
- @deluthium/institutional-adapter -- FIX 4.4 gateway + OTC API
- @deluthium/cli                   -- Interactive setup CLI

## Supported Chains

- BNB Smart Chain (56)  -- Live, RFQ Manager: 0x94020Af3571f253754e5566710A89666d90Df615
- Base (8453)           -- Live, RFQ Manager: 0x7648CE928efa92372E2bb34086421a8a1702bD36
- Ethereum (1)          -- Coming soon
- Arbitrum One (42161)  -- Coming soon
- zkSync Era (324)      -- Coming soon
- Polygon (137)         -- Coming soon

## Key Concepts

- RFQ (Request for Quote): Agent requests a price, gets a guaranteed quote, then executes on-chain. No order book management needed.
- Indicative Quote: Non-binding price check for discovery. Use before committing.
- Firm Quote: Binding quote with calldata. Submit the calldata as a blockchain transaction to execute.
- EIP-712 Signing: Structured typed data signing for on-chain quote verification.
- Wei: All token amounts are in wei (smallest unit). Use toWei/fromWei utilities.

## Error Codes

- VALIDATION_ERROR     -- Invalid input parameters
- API_ERROR            -- HTTP or business logic error
- AUTH_ERROR           -- Authentication failed (401/403)
- RATE_LIMIT_ERROR     -- Too many requests (429)
- TIMEOUT_ERROR        -- Request timed out
- QUOTE_EXPIRED_ERROR  -- Quote past deadline
- WEBSOCKET_ERROR      -- WebSocket connection failure
- SIGNING_ERROR        -- EIP-712 signing failed
- CHAIN_ERROR          -- Chain not supported

## Examples

- examples/ccxt-basic           -- CCXT exchange interface usage
- examples/custom-mm            -- Full SDK: REST, WebSocket, signing
- examples/0x-rfq-maker         -- 0x RFQ maker
- examples/1inch-limit-order    -- 1inch limit orders
- examples/uniswapx-filler      -- UniswapX order filling
- examples/hashflow-mm          -- Hashflow market making
- examples/paraswap-pool        -- Paraswap liquidity source
- examples/dydx-arbitrage       -- Cross-venue arbitrage
- examples/pancakeswap-router   -- Split-route PancakeSwap
- examples/institutional-fix    -- FIX protocol quickstart
- examples/hummingbot-strategy  -- Hummingbot strategy
